cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Heimdallr deals combat damage to a player that isn't its owner, strike a deal.
[i]Soul Contract[/i] — At the beginning of each players upkeep, they may pay 4 life and gain control of Heimdallr. If they do, untap Heimdallr and it gains haste and flying until end of turn. If you own Heimdallr, gain control of it and it gains haste until end of turn.
Heimdallr can't be sacrificed.

Vigilance
Whenever you make a deal, each opponent loses 2 life, you gain life equal to the amount of life lost this way.
Whenever a deal ends, create a 3/3 white and black Angel Demon creature token with flying.
Partner with Capitalis, the Fine Print [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Capitalis into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Flying
[i]Soul Contract[/i] — At the beginning of each players upkeep, that player may discard a card. If they do, they strike a deal. If you own Capitalis and have no ongoing deal, strike a deal.
Partner with Atheis, Bearer of Thesis [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Atheis into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
Each player chooses a creature they control. Exile each creature that wasn't chosen this way. End all deals.

You and target opponent clash. The player that wins strikes a deal. If you lose, return Stick Em Up to your hand as it resolves. [i](Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)[/i]
Each player draws a card.

Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
Strike a deal.

At the beginning of your end step, you may end an ongoing deal you control.
Whenever you end a deal, gain 2 life and draw a card.
Counter target noncreature spell. If you have an ongoing deal, create a treasure token unless an opponent pays {2}.

If you would create one or more tokens, create twice that many instead.
At the beginning of your end step, lose 3 life.

Ward {1} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
[i]Soul Contract[/i] — At the beginning of each players upkeep, they may pay 4 life. If they do, they create a two treasure tokens. If you own Rich Lich Walrus, create two treasure tokens.
Whenever an opponent draws their second card each turn, you and that player create a tapped treasure token. If you have an ongoing deal, draw a card.

When Sly Negotiator enters the battlefield, end a deal. [i](Target deals controller sacrifices it.)[/i]
Whenever a deal ends, its controller loses 3 life.

Flying, ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
When Deal Broker Sphinx enters the battlefield, each player who has no ongoing deal, strikes a deal.
Whenever a player strikes a deal, they scry 2.

If a deal would be ended, its controller may pay 4 life instead of sacrificing it.
Whenever an opponent strikes a deal, they lose 4 life.

Flying
At the beginning of each players end step, if they have an ongoing deal, they draw a card.
Other Demons you control get +1/+1 and have “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, end a deal that player controls.”
Exile target creature. Its controller strikes a deal.

End a deal. [i](Target deals controller sacrifices it.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Draw an additional card if you have an ongoing deal.”

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Meet Up Spot: Search your library for up to two land cards and reveal them. Put both of them onto the battlefield tapped if you have an ongoing deal, if not, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

Whenever a deal ends, its controller investigates.
{4}: Target player investigates. Any player may activate this ability. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you own Crime Scene.

You may look at the top card of your library at any time.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have an ongoing deal, you may surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Vigilance
[i]Soul Contract[/i] — At the beginning of each players upkeep, that player may pay 2 life. If they do, they scry 3. If you own Undercover Opperative, you may shuffle your library.

Lifelink
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, Grizzly Bodyguard deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Trample
Whenever a deal ends, Danger Angler connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or less.
• Each opponent loses 4 life.
• Strike a deal, then strike another deal.

When Draw Blood enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two creatures.
Pay 2 life: Draw a card. Activate this only once during your turn and only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of each end step, if you have half your starting life total or less, end this deal.

When Weapon Trafficking enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your hand.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter onto a creature you control. If you cannot, end this deal.

When Hiring Goons enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card.
Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/2 black Demon creature token. Activate this only once each turn, and only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more creatures, end this deal.

When Body Laundering enters the battlefield, mill eight cards or sacrifice it.
Sacrifice a creature you control: Create a treasure token. Activate this only once each turn, and only as sorcery.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have ten or more creature cards in your graveyard, end this deal.

When Bubbles, Gulp Blaster enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
Discard a card: Return Bubbles to its owners hand. Activate this ability only if you have an ongoing deal.

Calihan gets +1/+1 for each Rat you control.
Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 1/1 black Rat Demon creature token with deathtouch.

At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
Whenever an opponent strikes a deal, you may make a copy of the deal they choose.

Flying
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Sphinx of the Dark Tower connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever Sphinx of the Dark Tower leaves the battlefield, create a treasure token for each +1/+1 counter it had on it.
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, gain 2 life.

Wrap Glove Brawler can't be blocked by creatures with lesser power.
Sacrifice an enchantment: Wrap Glove Brawler fights another target creature.

When Scheming Crime Lord enters the battlefield, strike a deal.
{3}{U}{U}: Exile Scheming Crime Lord, then return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

Deathtouch
Whenever Click Clack Ratta Tat attacks, it deals 1 damage to up to X target creatures, where X is its power.

When Sting Operative enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top card of their library and put a sting counter on it.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, that player may play a card in exile with a sting counter on it until end of turn.

Trample
[i]Lieutenant[/i] — Whenever you attack, as long as you control your commander, create a treasure token for each ongoing deal you have.
When Grizzly Blockrunner enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
{T}: Create a treasure token. Activate this ability only if an opponent struck a deal this turn.

cards.special_text:
I — Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
II — Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
III — Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control this turn, draw a card.

I — Tap target creature.
II — Target creature you don't control can't be blocked this turn.
III — End a deal.

I — Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
II — Strike a deal.
III — Create a treasure token.

I — Each player creates three treasure tokens.
II — Until end of turn, treasures you control have, “{T}: Add two mana of any color.”
III — Each opponent loses 2 life for each artifact and enchantment on the battlefield.

I — Create a 2/2 black Demon creature token.
II — Gain 4 life.
III — Return target creature card from your graveyard into its owners hand.

I — Tango Takedown deals 3 damage to target creature.
II — Whenever a Demon you control attacks this turn, tap target creature defending player controls.
III — Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

cards.rules_text:
Demons you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Stuck In Tradition or another enchantment you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player who has an ongoing deal draw a card.

When Demonic Interogation enters the battlefield, each player surveils 3, then each player reveals the top card of their library. Each player who reveals a nonland card loses 2 life and creates two treasure tokens.
Whenever you strike a deal, you may have another target player may pay {3}. If they do, they create a token copy of your deal.
If you would mill one or more cards, surveil that many cards instead.

Enchantments you control have ward {1}. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
Whenever you end a deal, you may sacrifice Moonlight Operative. If you do, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

When Kuzenbo, Father of Crime enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 blue Turtle Demon creature tokens where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped treasure token.
End all deals. For each deal ended this turn, create a 2/2 Black Demon creature token. [i](Each player sacrifices each deal you control.)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast Beamtown Blow Up, you may end a deal you control.
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a deal ended this turn, creatures get -5/-5 instead.

Each opponent sacrifices a creature or enchantment.
If you have an ongoing deal, create a treasure token.
Exile target creature you control. Then return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
Create a copy of target nonland permanent you control. If that permanent was a deal, create a 2/2 Black Demon creature token as well.

As an additional cost to cast Unlocking the Clues, you may sacrifice any number of Clues.
Draw a card, then draw an additional card for each Clue you sacrificed this turn.

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{B}.
{2}, Sacrifice Distilled Painting: Draw a card.

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{B}.
{2}, Sacrifice Mayor's Compass: Draw a card.

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{U}.
{2}, Sacrifice Temporal Oddity: Draw a card.

Destroy target creature.
If you have an ongoing deal, create a treasure token.

At the beginning of your end step, investigate. If you have an ongoing deal, investigate an additional time. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

When Cut Off enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {2}.
The first noncreature spell you cast during your turn cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of your end step, if you cast two or more creature spells this turn, end this deal.

When Protect The Merchandise enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you mill four cards.
Whenever you attack, put a shield counter on an attacking creature you control. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you two or more creatures you control died this turn, end this deal.

When Spike The Punch enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay 4 life.
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn and only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped creatures, end this deal.

When Unpack The Loot enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless sacrifice a creature and discard a card.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have drawn three or more cards this turn, end this deal.

When Return To Base enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless have each opponent create a treasure token.
{2}: Return target creature you control to your hand. Activate only once each turn and only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control no creatures, end this deal.

When Blood For Blood enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you end a deal you control.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life. Then if you control no creatures, end this deal.

Booze Strip enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{1}{W}{B}, {T}: Gain 2 life.

Motel 12 enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{1}{U}{B}, {T}: Tap target creature.

Smogg Station enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}{W}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Smogg Station: Create a copy of target enchantment you control.

Phobos, Neon Square enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}: Target player strikes a deal.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

Distinct Street enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

Westward Community College enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{1}{U}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Westward Community College: Counter target spell unless its controller pay {2} for each Demon you control.

Corner Store enters the battlefield tapped unless you have an ongoing deal.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Office Warehouse enters the battlefield tapped unless you have an ongoing deal.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Corporate Lounge enters the battlefield tapped unless you have an ongoing deal.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

Demonic Watchtower enters the battlefield tapped unless you have an ongoing deal.
{T}: Add {B}.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Demonic Watchtower: Demons you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Pay 1 life, {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color of a creature you control.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Secure Safehouse: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

Library Locker enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.
{3}: Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.
Whenever you strike a deal, untap The Hideout.
Sacrifice two treasures: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you have an ongoing deal.

You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
